name: Ext_R2_MedicationAdministration_encounter
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.MedicationAdministration.encounter for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicationAdministration.encounter from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicationAdministration|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R5.

element.definition: The visit, admission or other contact between patient and health care provider the medication administration was performed as part of.
element.comment: `MedicationAdministration.context` maps to R5 `MedicationAdministration.encounter`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/EpisodeOfCare)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: The visit, admission or other contact between patient and health care provider the medication administration was performed as part of.
element.comment: `MedicationAdministration.context` maps to R5 `MedicationAdministration.encounter`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/EpisodeOfCare)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
